headline: Trump Tariffs Loom Over Ad Industry, From Brands to Digital Sellers
summary: Automotive and other sectors will likely cut spending if all threatened tariffs take effect, while the China tariffs now in place stand to undermine big-spending brands like Temu.

headline: Truist cuts Chevron price target on free cash flow concerns
summary: Investing.com -- Truist Securities lowered its price target on Chevron Corp (NYSE:CVX) to $160 from $164 on weaker-than-expected free cash flow and potential headwinds in the company's downstream segment.
